鵔字的基本解释

鵔
jùn
〔鵔鸃（
y?）〕赤雉，即“锦鸡”。

鵔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jùn］
［《廣韻》須閏切，去稕，心。］
亦作“鵔1”。
(1)见“鵕鳥”。
(2)见“鵕”。

鵔字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鵔； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1490第09
【唐韻】私閏切【韻會】【正韻】須閏切，?音峻。【說文】鵕䴊驚也。【玉篇】鳥狀如鴟，赤足，直喙，黃文。【正字通】鳥似鳳有光彩。李彤曰：鵔䴊，神烏，飛光竟天。【南越志】增城縣多鵔䴊。【正字通】鵔䴊似山雞而小，卽錦雞也。一作鵔䴊。又冠名。【前漢·佞倖傳】孝惠時郞侍中皆冠鵔鸃。嚴武詩：何須不著鵔鸃冠。

鵔字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鵔字的起名意思

暂无。

鵔
Basic explanation of words
鵔
jùn
〔鵔鸃(
y?)] Red pheasant, namely "Golden Pheasant".
鵔
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jùn］
["Guangyun" must be cut, go to the sea, heart. ]
Also known as "鵔1".
(1) See "Early Bird".
(2) See "鵕".
鵔
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鵔; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1490 Page 09
[Tang Yun] private run-cut [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] must be run-cut, and the sound is severe. [Said the text] Rong Qiao is also shocked. [Jade articles] The bird is shaped like an owl, barefoot, straight beak, and yellow text. 【Zhengzitong】Birds are glorious like phoenixes. Li Tong said: Qiangqi, Shenwu, Feiguang Jingtian. [Nan Yue Zhi] Duo Qiang Qiao in Zengcheng County. [Zhengzitong] Qianqi is like a pheasant but small, so is the golden pheasant. One for the 鵔䴊. Also named. [Previous Han·Nei Xing Biography] When Xiaohui, the servants were all crowned 鵔鸃. Yan Wushi: Why don't you wear a crown of 鵔鸃.
